txt.en: Rising into the Grey Mountains above the Greylin, Grálinvarth overlooks Elderslade. However, a recent ambush by dragon-kind of the Frost-horde threatens the dwarves keeping watch from this valuable foothold.\n\nYour mission is to repel the Frost-horde attackers and aid the wounded dwarves keeping watch at Grálinvarth.
A recent attack by the Frost-horde has threatened to overrun the dwarves keeping watch at Grálinvarth.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Ausma for your reward.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'I have received urgent word from Grálinvarth. The Frost-horde descended from the sky and ambushed our warriors! Several dwarves were wounded in the attack, and they have great need of your aid in repelling the Frost-horde.

'You are to travel to Grálinvarth at once and aid the wounded. We cannot allow Grálinvarth to fall to the Frost-horde! For the Gabil'akkâ!'
You may be ambushed after completing your objective.
Your mission is to repel the Frost-horde attackers and aid the wounded dwarves keeping watch at Grálinvarth.\n\nYou should talk to Ausma and travel to Grálinvarth.

'I have received word of your efforts at Grálinvarth, [placeholder].\n\n'Had you not come to the aid of our dwarves, the outcome of the battle might have been much different... and far more bloody. Very good!'
